评论详情: I wanted something to wear to keep warm without layers.  These worked perfectly.  They are comfortable and look great.  These are my daily go to for comfort and warmth.  One thing I would love to see though is the same top only without a collar.  Sizing was perfect and washes/dries quickly.  Definitely worth the price.

评论概述: The size guide is accurate, color is accurate, so soft,
评论详情: I got this for a gift for my sister and they were very soft. The sizing was accurate & you could wear these to lounge in or go out. Perfect for cold weather because they are thick. They do not have a zipper, the material is very fleece and soft. Very easy to dress up or down.
Very wide leg, not as pictured. The material is very stiff, not cozy. The color is also not olive but appears to be between green and brown, take from that what you will…

It’s comfy and good quality. The pants are super bulky and don’t come with a draw string. It’s just an elastic waist band (that’s why I took off a star). I mean it’s good quality.. but since my weight oscillates +/- 10 lbs I feel like a lot of the time they will be too big to wear. Solid option for sweats when you’re feeling heavier, I guess.

I was gifted the black one for Christmas and absolutely fell in love with it so much I bought another set for my self. Really comfortable, easy to wear, good material, fits true to size, and at an absolute great price!
True to size. Washes well and is warm and cozy for a casual outfit.
The material is very cheap and soooo thin. Some pictures here definitely show a product from a different material. The length is good tho. That’s the only thing
I am very happy with this purchase. Great sweatsuit for the winter.
I got this for my daughter for Christmas and she loves it so much I bought another one in a different color. Fits well and is comfortable.
came a little small, but very cute

评论概述: Going to buy in a different color

I ordered the green-brown color, which looked green in the advertised photos, but it is just brown, sadly, a looks a bit drab. I really like the shape and feel of the pants, but not very impressed with the hoodie. I would buy the pants by themselves, but the hoodie would not be able to stand alone. Overall I am disappointed, mostly with the color, even though I can see the potential for the pants.

I don’t know what the reviews were all about. Unless they changed the material. It’s v light, doesn’t fit the body, color is also not as shown and it’s still sitting in the closet since I bought it. I might return for my money
Cute set but the pants are too short.

I ordered a size small using the size guide, and they fit perfectly! I ordered it in black, dark grey, light grey, and blue. The only thing I will say is the dark grey has more of a brown-grey tone, unlike the photo (still cute)! Overall, really great for the price :)))  For reference, I wear a 32DDD, I have a 26” waist, and I am 5’4.
Love them very cute on cant watie for winter and fall. I am 265 and 5,5 there a little long but works and not over sized s little tight on pants to be 100%but worth every cent.

I got this for a train trip. Wanted something comfortable with pockets, a hoodie, and a pouch. It has those. The length is fine for me with typical tennis shoes that add about a half inch. Im 5'3. The problem i have is that when i washed and dried it on low, it came out not wrinkled but creased. I had to steam them out. We'll see if they crease or wrinkle badly while wearing...

I was very hesitant to buy clothes from Amazon. But I glad you were my first and I am very satisfied with the quality and fit. I am 5'5" with longer legs and a shorter torso, so regular size pants are usually short on me. But these pants reach my ankle just like the way I like my pants. Very comfortable,with the right thickness. Will definitely buy again.
Very comfy and cute
These Sweat paints and sweat shirt are so soft and comfortable and true to size, I Love them ❤️
I bought one and then I ended up buying 4 more for Christmas presents for the family!!! They are great quality….great fit!!! Must buy!!!

评论概述: Substantial fabric, well made and comfy.
评论详情: A flattering fit for bopping around the house or running errands and running into that neighbor you don't mind seeing because you look fab running errands. This feels more pricey than it is. You won't regret the trendy addition to your casual collection.

The hoodie is so comfortable and the perfect oversized. I’m 5’8 and the sweats actually go down over the tops of shoes which is what I wanted. DONT DRY THEM! They will shrink then not be quite as long!
El pantalón a nivel de cintura nada de elástico y rígido, corre pequeño solo en esa parte La suera bien ajustada pero sin terminaciones en las costura del frente
This suit is well-made with thick, soft fabric. True to size. Very cozy. I plan to wear it for sleep on a cross-country train trip.
Plush material, a little bulky but warm and comfortable
These are the most comfortable sweats I’ve ever worn. Loose fit in a cute way and super soft inside. This set is light weight yet super warm. ~The Wife
i loved this set the first time i wore it, but after the first wash the pants shrunk and are now too short :(
The material and cut on this makes it look cheap and frumpy. Keep looking.
Perfect for the weather, should size down because it’s oversized but overall the quality is great.

评论概述: Was not able to wear it

The pants were tight but the top was oversized.
You will absolutely swim in this! It's so bulky and unflattering! Don't bother. The fit is nothing like the pic. Don't waste your time. I guarantee you will just return it!
It’s oversized. I am 5’2 175 lbs and this is huge. The mismatched shades is another issue. The size chart isn’t very accurate. It is a little bit thin. I will be returning.

Overall, this set is okay. The hoodie is oversized, which I like, but it's not proportioned well—it’s cropped lengthwise and too wide, making it look a bit too boxy. The pants are super long (I’m 5'6" and they’re still too long), though the width is fine. I wish the hoodie was longer and the pants shorter. It has potential, but the fit just isn’t quite right for me.
Pants are very wide
Very comfortable and warm. good quality
This runs a little big.. i normally Wear a small.. i could Have went with x small but it’s super comfy and cute! Material is pretty thick so it’s perfect for winter outfit!

评论概述: Love it, but stained very easy
评论详情: I wear this outfit in and out. Its comfy and heavy enough to really keep you warm. Great for a night campfire or going to the grocery. It did stain very easily though,of course right in the front and won't come out. I would still buy a new one, but darker .

Wearing a size Large. I’m 5’5 and the pants are the perfect length. A little long but if you fold them at the top which I tend to do anyways they hit the perfect area of the foot/ankle. Warm and soft material both inside and out.
Material is very cheap. Im sure its has maybe 5 washes before it falls apart.

The fit and size were on point. This outfit is warm and cozy, made well, is stylish enough to wear out and about, washed well, and would be perfect with tennis shoes to travel in! It would definitely pack well!
I wasn't a fan of the fit, so I sent it back. The legs were a lot wider than expected, so it wasn't comfortable for me. The material was soft and the color was good.

As other reviews mention, you can’t choose a different size top and bottom. I love the oversized large hoodie but the pants were comical. Super wide leg and while I’m 5’2” the pants were probably meant for someone much taller. I couldn’t even roll the waist twice and wear shoes…they’d still be too long. Overall the suit is quality and I loved the color but will return because it would be impossible to wear the pants.
Cute, really comfy, great color! I like wearing bigger clothes so I ordered the XL. The Large would have been sufficient. But it’s great like this too.

I ordered this for my wife who loves to lounge around in this type of clothing around the house.  Unfortunately, this did not work for her.  My wife is about 5'4" and roughly 150lbs and typically wears a medium.  This sweatsuit set looked very sloppy on her because of how oversized it is.  The pants are also way too long on her, she was tripping on them.  There is no elastic or cinching at the bottom, so there is no way for her to wear these pants.  The elastic at the top of the pants is also pretty tight and not comfortable.  The sweatshirt fits her ok, she can wear this by itself.  The material is very soft and definitely will keep you warm.

This sweatsuit is really cute, I love the color! The material is very soft and comfortable. Definitely a great lounge set. The only downside is that you can not select different sizes for the top and bottoms. While I prefer an XL for the hoodie, I needed much smaller for the pants, so they are fairly big on me. However for lounging, I don't even care. They are roomy and extremely comfortable.
Very comfortable but is a bit small. I'm 5'10 and 150, I bought a large. They fit in the waist and chest but they are short in the legs.
These sets are comfortable and made of good quality material. I wish they had more color options! When ordering, select one size smaller.

For starters, I'm 5' 7" and 115ish lbs. I got the medium because I like things a little oversized, and the pants in sets like these usually aren't long enough if I get a small. Well, the mediums still weren't long enough for the bottoms unless I wore the waistband low-rise (no thank you). The hoodie is okay, but the bottom hem looks off to me. I think it's just the way it falls - very boxy.  But both items are very cozy, and the color is a pretty olive-army green. If you need some very casual hang-out clothes, these might be a good option, especially if you don't have to worry about the pants being long enough. I wouldn't say they're well-made enough to break out around other people.
Very comfy

This sweat set is comfortable.  I ordered it because the sweatpants bottoms dont gather, I hate those that do.  This fits true to size, washes well and is definitely warm!  I took a star off because of the color.  This is supposed to be a dark gray and it is dusky brown.  It looks like it was dark brown and left out in the sun!

For the price,  this set feels like luxury! Super soft inside,  high quality and looks nice.I do wish I would have sized up just a little in the waist of pants but since the set is considered oversized,  I didn't want it to be too baggy.  Also,  I have very long legs and it comes up just a bit higher than what I typically get but it works.
Such a warm two piece set. Very comfy and great for winter nights
Super comfortable, and a perfect plane outfit. Loose and roomy, but warm enough to keep you cozy. Material held up well (size-wise) in the wash and still feels soft.
Very nice product I was very pleased

This 2pc. is simply lovely! It’s heavier than it looks in the picture and it’s going to make a perfect fall outfit. The size is perfect and I can tell this is going to keep me warm - oh, and it’s SO comfy!! I’m very happy with this purchase. For the price, it’s absolutely worth it!

This track suit is very comfortable. I got it a size bigger, so it drapes just right and has a slimming effect that I was going for. The fabric is soft and not stretchy. The pants are really long and have a pull on closure with thick stretchy waistband and also two front pockets. The hoodie has one pocket in the front. This track suit is really cozy and I love wearing it when I feel chilled. It's sturdy and well made.

This is a stylish lounge/sweat set.. it’s not frumpy or anything outdated/cheap looking. It looks on par with other items in my closet purchased for 3-4x as much! This is soft, comfy and looks great.. I’m actually a little bit bummed I spent so much on others with celebrity names/endorsement before this set. There was zero reason when this looks as good and fits perfectly.
I'm 5'7" and the length of the pants was perfect for me.  Loved the softness of the material.

This sweatsuit is as advertised! I really like it! The material is soft on the inside and the set fits very well. I washed the set in hot water and dried it and it didn't shrink. The picture of me with the grey shirt is a picture of the pants after they were washed. Pockets are deep and fit my entire hand and wrist.  Would definitely recommend.
She said it fits well. She loves how soft it is.

I ordered this sweatsuit and I must say, it's a nice set. The material is nice and thick and will work well in the winter months. Sizing is true to size. I ordered a medium and it was a perfect fit, being 5'6" 185lbs. I have long legs so my only concern is I wish the pants legs were a tab bit longer because I don't know how much shrinkage it will do once I wash it. Overall, the sweatsuit is a nice fit and I do recommend this product.

I am 5’3” and 138 lbs.  This set fits great on me and is not overly long.  Please note that there is a wide leg opening for the bottoms.  Material is soft and comfortable.  I am looking forward to wearing it this fall in cooler weather.  Would recommend!

I like the grey-pink color, it’s pink yet not little-girl pink.  The fit is definitely oversized. I won’t be wearing this out, but it’s super comfy for hanging around the house.  The fabric has a subtle sheen to it.

This sweatsuit will be so welcome when the cold weather hits my area.  It is well made and almost thick with coziness. I like the pull over hoodie and the roomie pant that are not constricting at all.  A very nice well made set.
This outfit is excellent quality, the inside of the sweater and pants is super soft. The material is warm comfortable and perfect for fall. The fit is oversized.
Love the color. It's thick and soft. Bc very comfortable to wear
This is a nice set. Fits true to size and this is something I will be wearing a lot. The color is as pictured and material is soft.

评论概述: I am loving the wide legs
评论详情: This is the first time trying out a wide legged sweatsuit and I like it very much. More than I thought I would. The sweatsuit is baggy and soft and just so comfortable I could wear it every day. This is kind of a thinner sweat material that is really soft on the inside. The shirt has a nice hood and a nice pocket in the front and tight cuffs around the wrists. The pants have a great waistband and slit pockets on each side with the wide legs and ankles. No cuffs on the ankles. This is a really good quality, nice looking sweatsuit and I would absolutely recommend it.
Not tight or conforming anywhere…even a little loose.  I’m 5ft4, 32 bust, 26 waist, 35.5 hips and I ordered size Small.
The set fit great!!  I did return it because I had ordered two sets that were close in color.
It fits perfect! Super cozy and looks cute as can be, I figured I'd show picture as a bigger girly to give accurate showing on a plus size body:)
Love it,so soft
